product_name: Nite Ize ZipLit LED Zipper Pull Light - Package of 2
long_description: The Nite Ize ZipLit LED Zipper Pull light enhances your visibility and is super easy to attach to almost any zipper. Durable cord easily loops and cinches to zipper pulls and can be easily removed. Twist on/off switch. Water-resistant design protects light for use in wet conditions. Nite Ize ZipLit LED Zipper Pull light includes 2 long-lasting, replaceable batteries.
short_description: The Nite Ize ZipLit LED Zipper Pull light enhances your visibility and is super easy to attach to almost any zipper.
